parent.description: GTM Container's API relative path. Example: accounts/{account_id}/containers/{container_id}

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

Environment.description: Represents a Google Tag Manager Environment. Note that a user can create, delete and update environments of type USER, but can only update the enable_debug and url fields of environments of other types.

authorizationTimestamp.description: The last update time-stamp for the authorization code.

containerVersionId.description: Represents a link to a container version.

description.description: The environment description. Can be set or changed only on USER type environments. @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.create @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.update

enableDebug.description: Whether or not to enable debug by default for the environment. @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.create @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.update

environmentId.description: GTM Environment ID uniquely identifies the GTM Environment.

fingerprint.description: The fingerprint of the GTM environment as computed at storage time. This value is recomputed whenever the environment is modified.

name.description: The environment display name. Can be set or changed only on USER type environments. @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.create @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.update

tagManagerUrl.description: Auto generated link to the tag manager UI

url.description: Default preview page url for the environment. @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.create @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.update

workspaceId.description: Represents a link to a quick preview of a workspace.

$block: Represents a Google Tag Manager Environment. Note that a user can create, delete and update environments of type USER, but can only update the enable_debug and url fields of environments of other types.

$ul: **authorizationTimestamp**: The last update time-stamp for the authorization code.
**containerVersionId**: Represents a link to a container version.

**description**: The environment description. Can be set or changed only on USER type environments. @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.create @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.update
**enableDebug**: Whether or not to enable debug by default for the environment. @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.create @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.update
**environmentId**: GTM Environment ID uniquely identifies the GTM Environment.
**fingerprint**: The fingerprint of the GTM environment as computed at storage time. This value is recomputed whenever the environment is modified.

**name**: The environment display name. Can be set or changed only on USER type environments. @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.create @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.update
**tagManagerUrl**: Auto generated link to the tag manager UI
**url**: Default preview page url for the environment. @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.create @mutable tagmanager.accounts.containers.environments.update
**workspaceId**: Represents a link to a quick preview of a workspace.
